## Video playback
From the Events page, whenever a preview is available, the preview icon ( ![Video editor icon][3] ) will be displayed in the Actions column. Click on the icon to access the playback tool.

[![Playback mode][img_videoeditor_preview]][img_videoeditor_preview]

## Video editor
The video editor can be accessed the same way as the playback tool. Once you have opened the playback tool, click on "Editor" below the player controls to activate the editing tools.



The video editor contains three main sections.

### The player
[![Video player][img_videoeditor_player]][img_videoeditor_player]

### The toolbar
[![Video editor toolbar][img_videoeditor_toolbar]][img_videoeditor_toolbar]


### The timeline
[![Video editor timeline][img_videoeditor_timeline]][img_videoeditor_timeline]

### The actions bar
[![Video editor actions][img_videoeditor_actions]][img_videoeditor_actions]
